sentence: There are several potential techniques for bypassing the BBB for delivery of NPs at the tumor site in the CNS (Figure 1).
In this regard, nanocarriers have emerged as the most suitable candidates for mediating the delivery of diagnostic, therapeutic, theranostic agents (Figure 2).
